Header: Grace period for polythene usage ends: big fines and prison sentences for violators (VIDEO)
Content: The government declared a grace period for the Sri Lankan people to adjust to new laws on polythene usage. This grace period has now ended. From today (January 1) the Central Environmental Authority will begin raids to apprehend those who violate the new regulations on polythene products. The CEA says that it will “strictly adhere to the law”.
